description:
Lisa`s past finally catches up to her and Peter gets caught in the fallout. Why? Because life is contractually obligated to give him a hard time, that`s why.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Angry Megaton Axe
Peter Grill e o Machado Megaton Furioso
Peter Grill et la hache mégatonne en furie
Peter Grill to Ikari no Megaton Axe
Peter Grill und der Doppeltomahawk des Zorns
ピーター・グリルと怒りのメガトンアックス
